page.content: From it's fishing village beginning. Newport developed into a market town. Newport's trade and commerce was very dependant on the large local estates.{Workshops}made and repaired agricultural implements, hydraulic valves ,fencing and nails. Newport today has several general agricultural {engineering}works. It's main industry is{Serck Audco Valves}who are today renowned for their valves which are used worldwide.{Serck Audco}used to employ{1,100}people, but now they only employ{402}people. The loss of jobs was caused by modern technology and a slump in trade.{70% of their workers are men with full-time jobs.Most of the{Audco workers are local people.
